abstract: The phone company bought full-page ads several times a month for its Internet and TV service until the paper stopped accepting them a few months ago.
snippet: The phone company bought full-page ads several times a month for its Internet and TV service until the paper stopped accepting them a few months ago.
lead_paragraph: At a time when most newspapers are hungry for any ads they can sell, Newsday has turned away a steady, lucrative customer that is also a direct competitor of the paper’s parent company, Cablevision.

headline.main: Newsday Rejects Ads by Verizon, Now a Rival
headline.print_headline: Newsday Rejects Ads By Verizon, Now a Rival
